patch 8.2.0231: silent system command may clear the screen

Problem:    Silent system command may clear the screen.
Solution:   Do not clear the screen in t_te.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/348808f7c000a49d435c15db68c814b026f8167d|patch 8.2.0228: configure does not recognize gcc version on BSD>
patch 8.2.0228: configure does not recognize gcc version on BSD

Problem:    Configure does not recognize gcc version on BSD.
Solution:   Do not use "\+" in the pattern matching the version number. (Ozaki
            Kiichi, closes #5590)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0228: configure does not recognize gcc version on BSD · vim/vim@348808f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0228: configure does not recognize gcc version on BSD · vim/vim@348808f
attachments.text: Problem: Configure does not recognize gcc version on BSD. Solution: Do not use "\+" in the pattern matching the version number. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #5590)
